channel.title: Which stat should I specialize in?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Which stat should I specialize in?"

item.title: Re: Which stat should I specialize in?
item.content:encoded: If you are planning on burning missions, just do general missions and keep your stats relatively even. You don't have to go specific type missions unless you are looking for something specific.

item.title: Re: Which stat should I specialize in?
item.content:encoded: You need all stats, really. If you want to start Wasteland early, specialise in Genjutsu.

item.title: Which stat should I specialize in?
item.content:encoded: All of my stats (genjutsu, ninjutsu, and taijutsu) are at 11, and I have a RedEye bloodline. Is a certain stat better for certain bloodlines? If so, what should a RedEye character specialize in?
